ygData.subject: Re: sexual harrasment
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Now you re making me paranoid...  We re not all bad, I think... Really, I m the nicest male Wood Elf Bard you re likely to meet.  I d be 5 levels higher if
ygData.messageBody:
> One thing I have noticed: for some reason, seems like more wood elves and
> high elves have attitude problems than the other races. Wood elf male bards
> being the worst.

Now you're making me paranoid... We're not all bad, I think...

Really, I'm the nicest male Wood Elf Bard you're likely to meet. I'd be 5
levels higher if I didn't waste all my time doing corpse recoveries...

Next you're gonna say the blonde surfer-dude ones are worst of all... Sigh.
I knew I should have been one of the Keanau Reeves-looking Half-Elves...

- Luvas of Fennin Ro.

PS: Speaking of being 5 levels higher, My glacial climb in experience has
broght me in sight of 20th. Any suggestions for a last name for a tow-
headed wood elf songslinger?

PPS: I'd be happy to be a Gnome Lemming.
